description: Adjust colors by mixing color channels.
name: colorchannelmixer

options.description: set the red gain for the red channel (from -2 to 2) (default 1)
options.name: rr

options.description: set the green gain for the red channel (from -2 to 2) (default 0)
options.name: rg

options.description: set the blue gain for the red channel (from -2 to 2) (default 0)
options.name: rb

options.description: set the alpha gain for the red channel (from -2 to 2) (default 0)
options.name: ra

options.description: set the red gain for the green channel (from -2 to 2) (default 0)
options.name: gr

options.description: set the green gain for the green channel (from -2 to 2) (default 1)
options.name: gg

options.description: set the blue gain for the green channel (from -2 to 2) (default 0)
options.name: gb

options.description: set the alpha gain for the green channel (from -2 to 2) (default 0)
options.name: ga

options.description: set the red gain for the blue channel (from -2 to 2) (default 0)
options.name: br

options.description: set the green gain for the blue channel (from -2 to 2) (default 0)
options.name: bg

options.description: set the blue gain for the blue channel (from -2 to 2) (default 1)
options.name: bb

options.description: set the alpha gain for the blue channel (from -2 to 2) (default 0)
options.name: ba

options.description: set the red gain for the alpha channel (from -2 to 2) (default 0)
options.name: ar

options.description: set the green gain for the alpha channel (from -2 to 2) (default 0)
options.name: ag

options.description: set the blue gain for the alpha channel (from -2 to 2) (default 0)
options.name: ab

options.description: set the alpha gain for the alpha channel (from -2 to 2) (default 1)
options.name: aa

options.description: set the preserve color mode (from 0 to 6) (default none)
options.name: pc

options.description: set the preserve color amount (from 0 to 1) (default 0)
options.name: pa
